title: Book a Dinner Cruise Package
description: A customer wants to book a dinner cruise package on the Seine River in Paris.

tasks.description: Search for available dinner cruise packages on the desired date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds several dinner cruise options with different menus and prices.

tasks.description: Present the options to the customer and help them select a package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Customer selects the 'Prestige Menu' dinner cruise.

tasks.description: Book the selected dinner cruise package and process the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the package and provides a voucher.
